title: Suicide bomber in Pakistan kills Chinese national in roadside attack - Chinese embassy
content:
1. Suicide bomber in Pakistan kills Chinese national in roadside attack - Chinese embassy  Reuters
  2. Embassy condemns suicide attack targeting Chinese nationals in Pakistan, two local children killed  Global Times
  3. China condemns Suicide Attack at Gwadar, Pakistan  TIMES NOW
  4. Two killed in suicide bombing targeting Chinese nationals in Pakistan  Reuters
  5. Multiple deaths in Pak's Gwadar after blast target vehicle carrying Chinese nationals  Hindustan Times
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
